pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ClusterFuzzThis directory contains the source of ClusterFuzz.## Building and testing libClusterFuzzRun `./build.sh` to build the pip package.For testing, use a fresh Python 3 virtualenv, and install the package by running`pip install dist/*.whl`.Then,```bash$ cd tests$ python -m unittest```## PublishingIncrement the version field in `setup.py`, then run `./build.sh` to build thepip package. TODO: Tie pip package version to ClusterFuzz version once it'sstable.Per[https://packaging.python.org/tutorials/packaging-projects/#uploading-the-distribution-archives],to publish the pip package,```bash$ python3 -m pip install --user --upgrade twine$ python3 -m twine upload dist/*```
